# test-value Coding Standards

## Naming Conventions

Document your naming conventions here.

### Object Naming

- Tables: `TBL_[Name]`
- Codeunits: `CU_[Name]`
- Pages: `PG_[Name]`

### Field Naming

Describe field naming standards.

How code should be organized in this layer.
